title: Shar's Sting
content:
Shar's Sting Uncommon 3~9 Damage 1d4 +1 Piercing+1d4 Necrotic Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The blade is sharp, and the handle firm. Yet death exudes from this dagger as it might from a fresh corpse. Dagger Light Finesse Thrown 0.45 65

1d4 +1 Piercing+1d4 Necrotic

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

The blade is sharp, and the handle firm. Yet death exudes from this dagger as it might from a fresh corpse.

Dagger Light Finesse T
